title: Easy lamb tagine
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1kg lamb shoulder, cut into pieces', '3 onions, minced', '5 tomatoes, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste', '25g fresh coriander, chopped', '150ml creme fraiche']
